attributes.action: force motgage providers to accept the repossession and forced sale of a property will clear the debt completely.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the lenders are forced to accept that the monies received from a repossession and subsequent forced sale clear the total of any outstanding mortgage, whatever the shortfall, they may be less hasty to start such proceedings.  It is cruel that somebody can lose their home and still have a debt outstanding if the forced sale doesn't satisfy the outstanding mortgage.
